| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." *
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt)
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action")
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| where Action == "Deny";
ActivityData
| summarize Amount=count() by SourceIP
| join kind = inner
(
    ActivityData
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SourceIP) on SourceIP
    | project-away SourceIP1, TimeGenerated
    | top 10 by Amount
    | sort by Amount","size":1,"title":"Unique Source IP addresses, filterable by SelectedSourceIP","noDataMessage":"There are no Application Rule logs within the selected workspaces. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/firewall/","noDataMessageStyle":2,"timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","exportFieldName":"SourceIP","exportParameterName":"SelectedSourceIP","exportDefaultValue":"*","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspaces}"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"Amount","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},"subtitleContent":{"columnMatch":"SourceIP","formatter":1,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},"secondaryContent":{"columnMatch":"Trend","formatter":9,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},"showBorder":false}},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"AFAppRule"},"name":"query - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let AFAppUrl = AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where msg_s contains "Web Category:" and msg_s contains ". Url"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Url:" Url ". Action: " Action ". Rule Collection:" RuleCollection ". Rule:" Rule ". Web Category:" WebCategory;
let AFAppWOUrl = AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where msg_s contains "Web Category:"
| where msg_s !contains ". Url"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePort " to " FQDN ":" DestinationPort ". Action: " Action ". Rule Collection:" RuleCollection ". Rule:" Rule ". Web Category:" WebCategory;
let AFApp = AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where msg_s !contains "Web Category:"
| where msg_s !contains ". Url"
| where Resource in~ (split("CH1-FW, CH1-FW-Dev, FW-PREM, SOC-NS-FW", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt: int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt: int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S), SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied", "Deny", "Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "", Action1, Action2), Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "", case(Rule2b == "", " default action", Rule2b), Rule1), Rule2a), RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "", case(RuleCollection2a == "", "No rule matched", RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b), FQDN = case(FQDN == "", " default action", FQDN), TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", " default action", TargetPort);
union AFApp, AFAppUrl, AFAppWOUrl
| summarize Count = count(), last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)) by RuleCollection, Rule, WebCategory
